name: Wake Un-Dead
description:
Dead don't have as much peace as they used to. Throughout the land people whisper about walking dead. Leaving their graves, they walk out into the night and never return. You are one of the people that were refused by Death. Will you live this second life long enough to find out why?

Short text adventure story seen through the eyes of Undead. Escape the town before witchhunters catch you!

First game in the planned Un-Dead series.

- short gameplay (ideal for travel)
- seven different endings (good and bad)
- interesting story
- English and Czech language

Should you spot any mistakes or have some ideas for improvement I'll be happy to hear them.

Enjoy the game!
